colorTheory.description: This palette combines a classic black and white scheme with a touch of blue for contrast and emphasis.
colorTheory.mood: The colors evoke a sense of professionalism and clarity, with a modern touch.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between text and background colors ensures readability, and the accent color adds visual interest.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The black text color and white background create a strong base, while the blue accent color provides a pop of color without overwhelming the design.
